str2: Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Sarah, wife of Abraham. Of Hebrew origin; Sarra, the wife of Abraham.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.
Age, term of life; full age, maturity; stature. From the same as helikos; maturity.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
From kataballo; a deposition, i.e. Founding; figuratively, conception.
From speiro; something sown, i.e. Seed; by implication, offspring; specially, a remnant.
Of time: when, after; of cause: since, because; otherwise: else. From epi and ei; thereupon, i.e. Since.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) To lead, (b) To think, be of opinion, suppose, consider.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: From epi and the base of aggelos; to announce upon, i.e. to engage to do something, to assert something respecting oneself.
